WorkItem.ClosedComment: The primary issue listed here (threat being over 1 mil) is fixed
WorkItem.Description:
TankDK threat values severely outweigh threat and mitigation numbers, at least with blood talents and a blood rotation.
 
With Survivability and Threat weights set to 1.0 each, Attacker level at 83, attack speed of 2.5, Damage Per Shot at 10,000, incoming magic damage at 0%, boss armor at 10643 and # of targets set to 1 (all defaults on loading a new character, along with full raid buffs entered, here are the following values:
 
Survival: 136,951
Mitigation: 50,101
Threat: 1,874,203
Overall: 2,061,256
 
This results in DPS gear propagating the gear listings. Character XML attached.

Comments.Message:
Sorry, didn't quite include the inputed Blood Rotation:
Number of Diseases: 2
Disease Uptime: 100%
Disease Duration: 20sec
Death Coil: 1
Icy Touch: 1
Plague Strike: 1
Rune Strike: 3.25
Heart Strike: 4
Death Strike: 3
Thank you for the specifics.  I've started the refactoring of the Rotation code that should eliminate some of the synchronization as well as threat weight problems.
